DataElement.preferredName: Body Joints Swelling Effusion Assessment Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to represent the number of evaluated body joints that have swelling or effusion(s) present.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The entire physical structure of an organism.  It is composed of anatomic systems, regions, cavities, and spaces._The connection point between two bones or skeletal elements. The joint may be fixed or movable._Enlargement; expansion in size; sign of inflammation_A collection of fluid in a body cavity.  It may be the result of a non-neoplastic disorder (e.g. heart failure) or a tumor (e.g. carcinoma of the lung). -- 2003_The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The entire physical structure of an organism.  It is composed of anatomic systems, regions, cavities, and spaces.:The connection point between two bones or skeletal elements. The joint may be fixed or movable.

Concepts.definition: The entire physical structure of an organism. It is composed of anatomic systems, regions, cavities, and spaces.
The connection point between two bones or skeletal elements. The joint may be fixed or movable.

Property.preferredDefinition: Enlargement; expansion in size; sign of inflammation:A collection of fluid in a body cavity.  It may be the result of a non-neoplastic disorder (e.g. heart failure) or a tumor (e.g. carcinoma of the lung). -- 2003:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: Enlargement; expansion in size; sign of inflammation
A collection of fluid in a body cavity, which may be the result of a non-neoplastic disorder (e.g. heart failure) or a tumor (e.g. carcinoma of the lung).
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A number with no fractional part.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.:A number with no fractional part.

Concepts.definition: Determining the number or amount of something.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Copied from the CAP Protocol for use on forms.
